segments.text: Have you ever thought about Tom ’ s attitude ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve cut it up and come to the conclusion that hi is actually sick of Jenny ’ s brother . But he likes Jenny . She is a big apple in his eye .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Love me , love my dog . He ’ s a sensible kind man .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s why many people look up to him .
segments.speaker: S2
